channel.title: Comments on: I think i tore my cruciate ligament on tuesday.
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: George Dafermos
item.dc:creator: George Dafermos
item.description: sorry to hear about this Tomas. think positively and everything will go well.
item.content:encoded: sorry to hear about this Tomas. think positively and everything will go well.

item.title: By: Rudi von Staden
item.dc:creator: Rudi von Staden
item.description: Too bad, Tomas, I hope it gets sorted out soon. Soccer at the next SummerSource camp just wouldn't be the same without you!
item.content:encoded: Too bad, Tomas, I hope it gets sorted out soon. Soccer at the next SummerSource camp just wouldn’t be the same without you!

item.title: By: hotel
item.dc:creator: hotel
item.description: I had a real block around lyrics for songs caribbean cruise I was writing, in particular. And one thing cruise that really helped to lift me out of that self-damning ski vacation phase was to go into the studio with Phil and budget car rental make a rap song. Two things about that: first, last minute travel even though it was a first effort, and we were las vegas hotel two whiteys who admittedly didn't know as vacation
item.content:encoded:
I had a real block around lyrics for songs caribbean cruise I was writing, in particular. And one thing cruise that really helped to lift me out of that self-damning ski vacation phase was to go into the studio with Phil and budget car rental make a rap song. Two things about that: first, last minute travel even though it was a first effort, and we were las vegas hotel two whiteys who admittedly
didn’t know as vacation
